name: Legion's Crawl 2
description:
Lazily named themselves Legion, a group of survivalists has been getting by as drifting mercenaries In the world without law. Since the standard has been lowered more than ever, they began to build a reputation more than they intended to.

And one day, they received the most confusing job of their career; save a poor, secluded village... but even the client doesn't know what they are supposed to be saved from.

Key Features:

  • A classic turn-based, grid-based, roguelike dungeon crawler!
  • 3 randomly-generated dungeons with different lengths and difficulties.
  • Earn Upgrades to get the advantages to overcome the challenges. But if you are good enough, they are completely optional.
  • Vast character build possibility with equipment, attributes, and skills of your choice. But beware, a build without purpose and consideration to the situation may not be good enough...
  • No drama, no lengthy cutscene. Get to the action immediately!
